name: Quest-IONS
description:
How to play?

SPACEBAR: Start or pause the game.

Z: Redo last action.

Arrows: Move character.

NES Rom

This short game can be played on NES emulators. If you can't play online, the ROM is available to download.

License

The ROM can be distributed for personal / educational projects. Commercial use is not allowed.

Support

Support the project by leaving a comment below or visiting https://patreon.com/rmocci
